item.description:
Kim and her partner Kate will host a game night at their house at 105 Golden Hill Avenue in Haverhill, MA.

We can have 3 game rooms or find a way to pile everyone into one room.

There will be a number of games to choose from, and we can split into 2-3 different game rooms. Some of the games include: Poker (where Kate has volunteered to be the dealer for the evening), Trivial Pursuit, Monopoly, Backgammon, Scrabble, Simpsons Pictionary, Taboo, Hilarium and Amazing Race DVD game.

Also feel free to bring a game of your own that you would really love to play.

The neighborhood is quiet residential, and parking will be available in the driveway, on the street in front of the house, and on Bowdoin Drive (a dead-end street to left just before you get to the house).

The only drawback to Haverhill is the lack of street signs - directions will be sent closer to the event along with a phone number to call if you get lost.

*Allergy Alert: We do have one cat, who we will probably keep in the upstairs bedroom. FYI, Kim has an allergy to cats, and she doesn't bother her.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: An Afternoon in Haverhill
